## wchToolsFileDescriptor() function

Constructs a file descriptor from the item

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function wchToolsFileDescriptor<T extends AuthoringItem>(aItem: T | FileDescriptor<T>): FileDescriptor<T>;
```
